zhao.algorithmMagic.algorithm.schemeAlgorithm

类 DecisionTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • zhao.algorithmMagic.algorithm.schemeAlgorithm.SchemeAlgorithm
      • zhao.algorithmMagic.algorithm.schemeAlgorithm.DecisionTree
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    OperationAlgorithm
    直接已知子类:
    RandomForest

    public class DecisionTree
extends SchemeAlgorithm
    决策树计算组件，具有着强大的决策数计算功能，能够将一些过滤事件按照熵计算出一定的顺序排序好。

    The decision tree calculation component has powerful decision number calculation function, and can sort some filtering events in a certain order according to the entropy calculation.

    作者:
    zhao

    • 字段概要

      protected int groupIndex 
      protected static OperatorOperationException OUT_OF_RANGE 

      • 从类继承的字段 zhao.algorithmMagic.algorithm.schemeAlgorithm.SchemeAlgorithm

        AlgorithmName, logger

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ArrayList<ArrayDoubleFiltering> decision(double[][] ints, int logBase, ArrayDoubleFiltering... arrayDoubleFiltering)
      通过决策树，对传进进来的决策序列重新排列，使其成为最优解。
      protected ArrayList<ArrayDoubleFiltering> decision(double[][] ints, int logBase, List<ArrayDoubleFiltering> arrayIntegerFiltering, int max)
      通过决策树，对传进进来的决策序列重新排列，使其成为最优解。
      ArrayList<ArrayIntegerFiltering> decision(int[][] ints, int logBase, ArrayIntegerFiltering... arrayIntegerFiltering)
      通过决策树，对传进进来的决策序列重新排列，使其成为最优解。
      protected ArrayList<ArrayIntegerFiltering> decision(int[][] ints, int logBase, List<ArrayIntegerFiltering> arrayIntegerFiltering, int max)
      通过决策树，对传进进来的决策序列重新排列，使其成为最优解。
      DoubleMatrix decisionAndGet(double[][] doubles, int logBase, List<ArrayDoubleFiltering> arrayIntegerFiltering)
      使用决策树的精准决策模式，获取到本次数据过滤之后的结果矩阵数值。
      IntegerMatrix decisionAndGet(int[][] ints, int logBase, List<ArrayIntegerFiltering> arrayIntegerFiltering)
      使用决策树的精准决策模式，获取到本次数据过滤之后的结果矩阵数值。
      static String executeGetString(double[][] doubles, ArrayList<ArrayDoubleFiltering> arrayList)
      执行决策方案，并将结果以Markdown流程图代码的方式返回出去，其可以被用来生成各种决策树执行流程图。
      static String executeGetString(double[][] doubles, ArrayList<ArrayDoubleFiltering> arrayList, boolean isLR, boolean isDetailed)
      执行决策方案，并将结果以Markdown流程图代码的方式返回出去，其可以被用来生成各种决策树执行流程图。
      static String executeGetString(int[][] ints, ArrayList<ArrayIntegerFiltering> arrayList)
      执行决策方案，并将结果以Markdown流程图代码的方式返回出去，其可以被用来生成各种决策树执行流程图。
      static String executeGetString(int[][] ints, ArrayList<ArrayIntegerFiltering> arrayList, boolean isLR, boolean isDetailed)
      执行决策方案，并将结果以Markdown流程图代码的方式返回出去，其可以被用来生成各种决策树执行流程图。
      static DecisionTree getInstance(String Name)
      获取到该算法的类对象，
      void setAccurate(boolean accurate)
      决策查询模式，如果设置为true 代表使用精准查询，在这种查询下，数据也会随着查询进度而改变，模拟实际的递归树，但是会有一些额外的计算开销。
      void setGroupIndex(int groupIndex)
      设置在进行决策计算时的中心字段，在进行决策计算的时候将会以中心字段为基准开始分组，建议使用比较均匀的值字段作为中心字段。

    • 方法详细资料

      • getInstance

        public static DecisionTree getInstance(String Name)
        获取到该算法的类对象，
        参数:
        Name - 该算法的名称
        返回:
        算法类对象
        抛出:
        TargetNotRealizedException - 当您传入的算法名称对应的组件不能被成功提取的时候会抛出异常

      • executeGetString

        public static String executeGetString(int[][] ints,
                                      ArrayList<ArrayIntegerFiltering> arrayList)
        执行决策方案，并将结果以Markdown流程图代码的方式返回出去，其可以被用来生成各种决策树执行流程图。

        Execute the decision scheme and return the results in the form of Markdown flowchart code, which can be used to generate various decision tree execution flowchart.

        参数:
        ints - 需要被进行决策项的数据样本

        Data sample of decision items to be made

        arrayList - 决策方案列表，其中每一个元素是一个事件过滤器，其代表的就是节点之间的过滤通道，在流程图中将会以过滤器的toString返回值作为通道名称！

        In the decision scheme list, each element is an event filter, which represents the filtering channel between nodes. In the flow chart, the return value of the filter toString will be used as the channel name!

        返回:
        执行结果，是数据过滤的操作过程，其是一个Markdown流程图代码的字符串，您可以将其以 Markdown 语法解析出流程图！

        The execution result is the operation process of data filtering. It is a string of Markdown flowchart code. You can create it out of the flowchart with Markdown syntax!

      • executeGetString

        public static String executeGetString(int[][] ints,
                                      ArrayList<ArrayIntegerFiltering> arrayList,
                                      boolean isLR,
                                      boolean isDetailed)
        执行决策方案，并将结果以Markdown流程图代码的方式返回出去，其可以被用来生成各种决策树执行流程图。

        Execute the decision scheme and return the results in the form of Markdown flowchart code, which can be used to generate various decision tree execution flowchart.

        参数:
        ints - 需要被进行决策项的数据样本

        Data sample of decision items to be made

        arrayList - 决策方案列表，其中每一个元素是一个事件过滤器，其代表的就是节点之间的过滤通道，在流程图中将会以过滤器的toString返回值作为通道名称！

        In the decision scheme list, each element is an event filter, which represents the filtering channel between nodes. In the flow chart, the return value of the filter toString will be used as the channel name!

        isLR - 流程图是否以左右的布局排版，如果设置为true代表从左到右排版，反之则代表从上到下排版。

        Whether the flow chart is typeset in left and right layout. If set to true, it means typesetting from left to right, otherwise it means typesetting from top to bottom.

        isDetailed - 流程图中的节点显示设置，如果设置为true，在节点位置将显示所有的数据，如果设置为false 节点显示概述信息。

        The node display settings in the flowchart. If set to true, all data will be displayed at the node location. If set to false, the node will display overview information.

        返回:
        执行结果，是数据过滤的操作过程，其是一个Markdown流程图代码的字符串，您可以将其以 Markdown 语法解析出流程图！

        The execution result is the operation process of data filtering. It is a string of Markdown flowchart code. You can create it out of the flowchart with Markdown syntax!

      • executeGetString

        public static String executeGetString(double[][] doubles,
                                      ArrayList<ArrayDoubleFiltering> arrayList,
                                      boolean isLR,
                                      boolean isDetailed)
        执行决策方案，并将结果以Markdown流程图代码的方式返回出去，其可以被用来生成各种决策树执行流程图。

        Execute the decision scheme and return the results in the form of Markdown flowchart code, which can be used to generate various decision tree execution flowchart.

        参数:
        doubles - 需要被进行决策项的数据样本

        Data sample of decision items to be made

        arrayList - 决策方案列表，其中每一个元素是一个事件过滤器，其代表的就是节点之间的过滤通道，在流程图中将会以过滤器的toString返回值作为通道名称！

        In the decision scheme list, each element is an event filter, which represents the filtering channel between nodes. In the flow chart, the return value of the filter toString will be used as the channel name!

        isLR - 流程图是否以左右的布局排版，如果设置为true代表从左到右排版，反之则代表从上到下排版。

        Whether the flow chart is typeset in left and right layout. If set to true, it means typesetting from left to right, otherwise it means typesetting from top to bottom.

        isDetailed - 流程图中的节点显示设置，如果设置为true，在节点位置将显示所有的数据，如果设置为false 节点显示概述信息。

        The node display settings in the flowchart. If set to true, all data will be displayed at the node location. If set to false, the node will display overview information.

        返回:
        执行结果，是数据过滤的操作过程，其是一个Markdown流程图代码的字符串，您可以将其以 Markdown 语法解析出流程图！

        The execution result is the operation process of data filtering. It is a string of Markdown flowchart code. You can create it out of the flowchart with Markdown syntax!

      • setGroupIndex

        public final void setGroupIndex(int groupIndex)
        设置在进行决策计算时的中心字段，在进行决策计算的时候将会以中心字段为基准开始分组，建议使用比较均匀的值字段作为中心字段。

        Set the center field during decision calculation. The group will start based on the center field during decision calculation. It is recommended to use a relatively uniform value field as the center field.

        参数:
        groupIndex - 中心字段对应的索引值，从0开始

        Index value corresponding to the center field, starting from 0

      • setAccurate

        public final void setAccurate(boolean accurate)
        决策查询模式，如果设置为true 代表使用精准查询，在这种查询下，数据也会随着查询进度而改变，模拟实际的递归树，但是会有一些额外的计算开销。

        If the decision query mode is set to true, it means accurate query is used. In this case, the data will also change with the query progress, simulating the actual recursive tree, but there will be some additional calculation overhead.

        参数:
        accurate - 如果设置为true 代表开启精准决策查询，反之将使用普通查询。

        If it is set to true, it means that accurate decision query will be enabled, otherwise, ordinary query will be used.

      • decision

        public ArrayList<ArrayDoubleFiltering> decision(double[][] ints,
                                                int logBase,
                                                ArrayDoubleFiltering... arrayDoubleFiltering)
        通过决策树，对传进进来的决策序列重新排列，使其成为最优解。

        Through the decision tree, the incoming decision sequence is rearranged to become the optimal solution.

        指定者:
        decision 在类中 SchemeAlgorithm
        参数:
        ints - 当前需要计算的样本矩阵数组

        Sample matrix array to be calculated currently

        logBase - 本次决策运算中需要使用的对数底数值

        The logarithmic base value to be used in this decision operation

        arrayDoubleFiltering - 本次需要被决策树重新排列的决策方案，这是一个数组，其中每一个都是一个事件判断函数的实现，最终会通过算法计算出结果数值

        The decision scheme that needs to be rearranged by the decision tree this time is an array, each of which is the implementation of an event judgment function. Finally, the result value will be calculated by the algorithm

        返回:
        重新排列过的 ArrayDoubleFiltering 决策方案，其中从0开始进行决策，是效果最好的处理方式。

        The rearranged ArrayDoubleFiltering decision scheme, in which the decision is made from 0, is the best way to deal with it.

      • decision

        public ArrayList<ArrayIntegerFiltering> decision(int[][] ints,
                                                 int logBase,
                                                 ArrayIntegerFiltering... arrayIntegerFiltering)
        通过决策树，对传进进来的决策序列重新排列，使其成为最优解。

        Through the decision tree, the incoming decision sequence is rearranged to become the optimal solution.

        指定者:
        decision 在类中 SchemeAlgorithm
        参数:
        ints - 当前需要计算的样本矩阵数组

        Sample matrix array to be calculated currently

        logBase - 本次决策运算中需要使用的对数底数值

        The logarithmic base value to be used in this decision operation

        arrayIntegerFiltering - 本次需要被决策树重新排列的决策方案，这是一个数组，其中每一个都是一个事件判断函数的实现，最终会通过算法计算出结果数值

        The decision scheme that needs to be rearranged by the decision tree this time is an array, each of which is the implementation of an event judgment function. Finally, the result value will be calculated by the algorithm

        返回:
        重新排列过的 ArrayDoubleFiltering 决策方案，其中从0开始进行决策，是效果最好的处理方式。

        The rearranged ArrayDoubleFiltering decision scheme, in which the decision is made from 0, is the best way to deal with it.

      • decision

        protected ArrayList<ArrayDoubleFiltering> decision(double[][] ints,
                                                   int logBase,
                                                   List<ArrayDoubleFiltering> arrayIntegerFiltering,
                                                   int max)
        通过决策树，对传进进来的决策序列重新排列，使其成为最优解。

        Through the decision tree, the incoming decision sequence is rearranged to become the optimal solution.

        参数:
        ints - 当前需要计算的样本矩阵数组

        Sample matrix array to be calculated currently

        logBase - 本次决策运算中需要使用的对数底数值

        The logarithmic base value to be used in this decision operation

        arrayIntegerFiltering - 本次需要被决策树重新排列的决策方案，这是一个数组，其中每一个都是一个事件判断函数的实现，最终会通过决策树算法计算出结果数值

        The decision scheme that needs to be rearranged by the decision tree this time is an array, each of which is the implementation of an event judgment function. Finally, the result value will be calculated by the decision tree algorithm

        max - 在决策排序时，您希望最终排序出的决策中最多有几个决策事件过滤器。

        When sorting decisions, you want to sort out at most several decision event filters.

        返回:
        重新排列过的 ArrayDoubleFiltering 决策方案，其中从0开始进行决策，是效果最好的处理方式。

        The rearranged ArrayDoubleFiltering decision scheme, in which the decision is made from 0, is the best way to deal with it.

      • decision

        protected ArrayList<ArrayIntegerFiltering> decision(int[][] ints,
                                                    int logBase,
                                                    List<ArrayIntegerFiltering> arrayIntegerFiltering,
                                                    int max)
        通过决策树，对传进进来的决策序列重新排列，使其成为最优解。

        Through the decision tree, the incoming decision sequence is rearranged to become the optimal solution.

        参数:
        ints - 当前需要计算的样本矩阵数组

        Sample matrix array to be calculated currently

        logBase - 本次决策运算中需要使用的对数底数值

        The logarithmic base value to be used in this decision operation

        arrayIntegerFiltering - 本次需要被决策树重新排列的决策方案，这是一个数组，其中每一个都是一个事件判断函数的实现，最终会通过决策树算法计算出结果数值

        The decision scheme that needs to be rearranged by the decision tree this time is an array, each of which is the implementation of an event judgment function. Finally, the result value will be calculated by the decision tree algorithm

        max - 在决策排序时，您希望最终排序出的决策中最多有几个决策事件过滤器。

        When sorting decisions, you want to sort out at most several decision event filters.

        返回:
        重新排列过的 ArrayDoubleFiltering 决策方案，其中从0开始进行决策，是效果最好的处理方式。

        The rearranged ArrayDoubleFiltering decision scheme, in which the decision is made from 0, is the best way to deal with it.

      • decisionAndGet

        public IntegerMatrix decisionAndGet(int[][] ints,
                                    int logBase,
                                    List<ArrayIntegerFiltering> arrayIntegerFiltering)
        使用决策树的精准决策模式，获取到本次数据过滤之后的结果矩阵数值。
        指定者:
        decisionAndGet 在类中 SchemeAlgorithm
        参数:
        ints - 当前需要计算的样本矩阵数组

        Sample matrix array to be calculated currently

        logBase - 本次决策运算中需要使用的对数底数值

        The logarithmic base value to be used in this decision operation

        arrayIntegerFiltering - 本次需要被决策树重新排列的决策方案，这是一个数组，其中每一个都是一个事件判断函数的实现，最终会通过决策树算法计算出结果数值

        The decision scheme that needs to be rearranged by the decision tree this time is an array, each of which is the implementation of an event judgment function. Finally, the result value will be calculated by the decision tree algorithm

        返回:
        由决策树使用精准模式进行决策选择之后，符合条件的所有数据行组成的矩阵对象。

        A matrix object composed of all data rows that meet the criteria after the decision tree uses the precise mode for decision selection.

      • decisionAndGet

        public DoubleMatrix decisionAndGet(double[][] doubles,
                                   int logBase,
                                   List<ArrayDoubleFiltering> arrayIntegerFiltering)
        使用决策树的精准决策模式，获取到本次数据过滤之后的结果矩阵数值。
        指定者:
        decisionAndGet 在类中 SchemeAlgorithm
        参数:
        doubles - 当前需要计算的样本矩阵数组

        Sample matrix array to be calculated currently

        logBase - 本次决策运算中需要使用的对数底数值

        The logarithmic base value to be used in this decision operation

        arrayIntegerFiltering - 本次需要被决策树重新排列的决策方案，这是一个数组，其中每一个都是一个事件判断函数的实现，最终会通过决策树算法计算出结果数值

        The decision scheme that needs to be rearranged by the decision tree this time is an array, each of which is the implementation of an event judgment function. Finally, the result value will be calculated by the decision tree algorithm

        返回:
        由决策树使用精准模式进行决策选择之后，符合条件的所有数据行组成的矩阵对象。

        A matrix object composed of all data rows that meet the criteria after the decision tree uses the precise mode for decision selection.
